Episodes.Title: Fairy Tale Endings
Episodes.Plot: Kris learns what happened to Kerry while Raintree deals with the unexpected fallout of the Breeders' Cup win. Meanwhile, Dani takes over the Davis ranch, but that doesn't stop her father from calling the shots; and Jean welcomes home a familiar face after a death in the family. Also, Matt rethinks his destiny on the farm.
Episodes.GuestStars: Brian Keith Gamble, Mary Woods, Jim Hatch, Charles Sanders, John Terry, Kieren Hutchison

Episodes.Title: The Feud
Episodes.Plot: Kris resorts to desperate measures to ease Raintree's financial crisis; Matt tries to beat Dani at her own game in a battle for an important client's business; and Junior finds old habits hard to break.
Episodes.GuestStars: Art Fox, Julia Thudium, Clay M. Lilley, Sofia Perl

Episodes.Title: Moving On
Episodes.Plot: After learning that Wildfire is sterile, Kris wants to get him back on the track but Jean and Pablo question whether or not she is pushing him too hard.
Episodes.GuestStars: Rio Alexander, Beau Garrett, Richard Nance

Episodes.Title: Close to Home
Episodes.Plot: After Kris Furillo's trailer burns down, her sense of independence is tested when she has to move in with the Ritter family.

Episodes.Title: Love vs. Work
Episodes.Plot: Upon learning that Avatar, Wildfire?s biggest rival, is one of Raintree?s new client?s horses and that Tina Sharp, Kris Furillo?s biggest rival, will be riding Avatar in the next big race, Kris and the Ritter family struggle to come to terms how to deal with having their biggest opponent train at Raintree.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amy Jo Johnson, Charlotte Salt, Eric Winter

Episodes.Title: Kiss, Kiss
Episodes.Plot: Kris, Matt and Junior try to change Ken's mind when he decides to sell Wildfire's son Flame; Dani moves into R.J.'s trailer.

Episodes.Title: Push Me, Pull You
Episodes.Plot: Gillian moves into the bunkhouse with Matt; Kris feels she and Wildfire are slowly losing their importance at Raintree.

Episodes.Title: The Goodbye
Episodes.Plot: Despite Pablo and Kris protests, Matt and Jean consider selling Wildfire to help Raintree stay afloat. Meanwhile, Gillian and Junior end up bonding at Bobby's club one night while Matt and Kris are busy.

Episodes.Title: Heartless
Episodes.Plot: Kris and Matt's relationship heats up and they dont know how to tell Junior, especially after the death of a close friend. Dani is having trouble with grief and it is affecting her work. Jean visits Davis farm for the first time since Pablo joined their staff.

Episodes.Title: Diplomacy
Episodes.Plot: Junior learns of Kris and Matt's new relationship; Matt and Jean search for a new trainer to replace Pablo.

Episodes.Title: You Can Count On Me
Episodes.Plot: As Kris and Matt are get to know one another better, Kris gets a surprise visit from Jace, her half-brother. Junior purchases Avatar, and makes his first order of business as new owner to fire Kris.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andrew Hoeft, Alex Carter, Ignacio Serricchio

Episodes.Title: Picking Sides
Episodes.Plot: The rivalry between Matt and Junior heats up; Gillian returns to town and finds solace with Junior.

Episodes.Title: So Long Pardner
Episodes.Plot: Kris considers a lucrative offer from Sheik Omar with the fate of Raintree hanging in the balance.
Episodes.GuestStars: Charlotte Salt, Andrew Hoeft, Maurizio Caine
